title: Club wants to edit Single Addendum C as a form including save/cancel
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the form is in preliminary or tendered states
custom_expected:
THEN the edit button is available
AND it puts the form in edit mode
AND user can make changes to editable fields, save and cancel

title: Club is able to tender or submit a single addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club
AND User selects a single preliminary addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User fufills all required fields and clicks tender
AND Clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Form changes to Tender
AND Turns into Pending
AND All changes are saved when states are changed
AND All rule checks are ran

title: Club is able to e-sign from a single c form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as club
AND Goes to a tendered addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN Users scrolls to bottom of addendum C page
AND Clicks on E-sign button
AND Clicking Submit for e-signature
custom_expected:
THEN E-sign button should appear on bottom 
AND "Are you sure message" appears when e-sign is clicked
AND Generating PDF modal should appear
AND this modal cannot be dismissed
AND this modal has a countdown timer beginning at 35
AND Form appears on player and club e-sig widgets

title: BOC wants to approve a single Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND user is viewing a single Add C
AND that Add C is Pending, Tendered or Preliminary
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a blue Approve button to the left of all other buttons
AND it is available in view and edit mode
AND if it is pressed in Edit mode, any changes are saved and the form reloads in view mode
AND all rule checks are run as if from the multi-C widget ([overridable warnings](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11989) and [hard errors](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11988))
AND the Add C shows up black in contract history
AND blue notification appears

title: As a club, I want to know if my e-signature submissions failed or passed when submitting single C for e-sign
As a club I want to view a listing of all my players that need Addendum C's
Using the tender button on selected rows updates those to "tendered"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a preliminary addendum C's
AND Fufills all required fields with no errors
AND Clicks Tender
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C's moves from Preliminary to Tendered

title: Verify When the 'Enter Salary' button is clicked, a pop-out containing a text box for entering a single salary value will appear.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User Selects a checkbox on a preliminary or not created addendum C
AND User selects Enter Salary Button
custom_expected: THEN A pop-out containing textbox for entering a single salary value will appear.

title: Verify BOC can save changes to any unapproved addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Views addendum C widget
AND Addendum C is not in approved status
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC clicks edit pencil on a addendum C
AND Edits a addendum C
AND Clicks save
custom_expected: THEN any changes made are saved.

title: Verify hitting the approve button moves addendum C to Approved state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN That User is logged in as BOC
AND is viewing addendum c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox on a addendum C that is not in "Not Created" or "Approved" state
AND Clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C moves to approved state

title: BOC wants to move an Add C back to Preliminary from the Multi-C widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND is viewing the multi-C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'Tendered' or 'Pending' Addendum Cs
custom_expected:
THEN user can click 'Return to Club' to the left of the split PDF button
AND the button is not active if other states are selected 
AND the Add Cs will move back to Preliminary status
AND no rule checks are run
AND the Add C attachment is deleted
AND a blue notification is triggered
AND the club receives an action item

title: Clicking E-sign will trigger a modal asking the user to confirm if they want to proceed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a Tendered Add C
AND clicks E-sign
custom_expected:
THEN a modal pops up asking the user if they want to proceed
Wireframe: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_add_cs_for_e-signature

title: Verify Club can click on the icon to bring up the PDF for player to e-sign. After this, the club hands the device over to the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN the e-sign icon is clickable

title: Verify Player is guided by the Adobe echo sign interface. The player will need to be guided to typing their name and drawing their signature.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the e-sign icon
custom_expected: THEN the user is prompted by the Adobe Echosign interface

title: Verify The form now drops off the Player E-signature widget. (Note: The next story makes this an automatic process but for now, its fine to only work on manually refresh)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has submitted a selected a player for e-signature from the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user completes the process
custom_expected: THEN the player's name will be dropped from the widget

title: Verify that if PDF is withdrawn pen icon reverts to upload icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has edited a form in e-sign state
AND saved
AND the warning modal appears
AND the user clicks "Ignore and Continue"
custom_expected: THEN the status icon reverts to the upload icon

title: Verify that if both club and player have signed the Addendum C, the C updates to "Pending".
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a player has signed his Addendum C
AND that THE club has signed his C
custom_steps: WHEN the user returns to the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the status of that form is shown as "Pending"

title: If the stamping was successfully complete, show a notification saying "X document(s) successfully E-Signed" and the form falls off the Club e-signature widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club has successfully stamped a form
custom_expected:
THEN a notification saying "X documents succesfully E-Signed" appears
AND the form falls off the Club e-signature widget

title: Verify E-Signed PDFs should now appear as a paper clip icon in the attachments column on the Addendum C widget.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player and club have e-signed an Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the form in the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the PDF appears as a paper clip icon in the attachments column

title: If the stamping was successfully complete, the forms fall off the Club e-signature widget and a notification is shown "x document(s) were successfully E-Signed"
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has e-signed multiple forms
custom_steps: WHEN the user stamps the club signature on them
custom_expected:
THEN the forms fall off the Club E-signature widget
AND a notification appears: "x document(s) were successfully E-Signed"

title: Verify When an addendum C is e-signed and approved, A BOC stamp is included at the bottom of the pdf
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND User looks for Tendered Addendum Cs
AND sends Addendum C to esign
AND Addendum C is esigned
custom_steps: WHEN BOC checks Uploaded Addendum C from esign
custom_expected: THEN Show BOC stamp at bottom of page that includes "For Commissioners office use only", "Approved and recorded", "By commissioner of Baseball" and the signature "Roy Krasik "designee"

title: As a club, I want to know if my e-signature submissions failed or passed when submitting multiple C's for e-sign
Batch Testing
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on multi c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox on 40 players
AND Clicks Edit
AND Adds value into salarys through enter salary
AND Clicks Save
AND Clicks Tender
AND Clicks E-Sign

*AND User is timing the time it would take for each state change.
custom_expected: THEN Timing is found for each state change for each batch:

title: Auth Signatory - Verify New Apply button saves and closes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the signature box will close and the signature will be saved

title: Salary Structures - Club is able to add multiple rows and Save or Cancel all Changes at once
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND clicks it again
custom_expected:
THEN the user can edit multiple rows
AND hit save or cancel all changes
AND the effect will be applied to all rows

title: MNC Verification Widget - BOC can approve one or more contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND can view pending contracts in the MN Contracts Verification Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN I check off one or more contracts
AND I click approve
custom_expected: THEN the contracts are approved

title: User can use advanced search for filter for contracts and add C's
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club/BOC
AND Goes to Advanced Search
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects addendum C Search For option
AND selects any filter
AND Clicks Search
custom_expected: THEN Results for filtered addendum C's should appear

title: BOC/Club can print a minor contract and Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club/BOC
AND User searches for minor contract at terms submitted/terms accepted state
custom_steps:
WHEN User finds terms submitted/terms accepted state contract
AND Opens contract
AND Goes to bottom of page 
AND Clicks print
custom_expected: THEN Adobe printed version of contract appears with all minor contract details

title: BOC/Club can view errors/warnings on contracts.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC/Club
AND When user is looking on contracts
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks submit terms without filling any information
*Test different things missing such as addendum B's and C's
custom_expected: THEN errors and warnings should appear based on missing information

title: BOC/Club can find a professional player through quick search
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user is club
AND types 3 or more letters into the quick search box 

2. WHEN user is BOC
AND types 3 or more letters into the quick search box
custom_expected:
THEN a scrollable drop down will appear with potential results for professional players
AND it will display their position and Org/Club

title: BOC Can return a terms accepted/pre approved to club
BOC Can terms accept and player is Pending Active on Roster
BOC Can approve a contract and player is active on roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND already have a contract in terms submitted/accepted state
custom_steps: WHEN I click Approve on the players contract
custom_expected:
THEN the contract updates to approved
AND player can be found on roster for the club he is signed to

title: BOC Can withdraw or void a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as BOC Admin
AND have located an existing MNC
custom_steps:
WHEN I (1) Click Withdraw button
(2)Click Void button
custom_expected:
(1) Contract status is updated to withdrawn. Comments are added
(2)Contract status is updated to voided everywhere. Comments are added.

title: As BOC, I want my signature stamped on the contract automatically on approval
BOC Can preapprove a contract that was pending investigations
As BOC, I want the player to get taken off the Roster if his contract for this season is rejected
As BOC, I want my signature stamped on multiple contracts automatically on approval
BOC can accept terms on a contract from the clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps:
WHEN I choose  a terms submitted contract from the clipboard
AND I checkoff the box and click Accept Terms
custom_expected:
THEN the contract updates to terms accepted
AND the contract stays in the clipboard

title: BOC can approve a contract from the MNC verf. widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I click approve for one or more contracts from MNC Verification WIdget
custom_expected:
THEN the contracts are successfulyl approved
AND contracts move off the widget

title: Club users can find a domestic amateur player through quick search and create a 1st year contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN club performs a quick search for a domestic amateur player drafted by their club
AND clicks on their profile
AND creates a new minor contract from the create new button in their profile header

2. WHEN club performs a quick search for a domestic amateur player that was passed over
AND clicks on their profile
AND creates a new minor contract from the create new button in their profile header
custom_expected: THEN a new contract is created for the club and opens in preliminary mode

title: Club can submit contract terms to BOC for Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary contract
AND the contract is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'terms submitted' from the update status dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN button follows the button table format
AND changes are saved
AND the form is reloaded in view mode
AND blue notification appears after successfully updated
AND status header to show Terms Submitted in green
AND 'Status Last changed, Changed by, Date Submitted and Submitted by' fields in the Status and Dates section are updated

title: Clubs want to create and save a a preliminary non-first year contract from Contract History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a pro player profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits "Create New"
custom_expected:
THEN a new contract creation form opens in edit mode
AND the user can save a preliminary version of the contract record
AND it can be reopened from Contract History
AND the buttons at the bottom behave according to global acceptance criteria

title: Club can resubmit Update TA contract to BOC
Club cannot edit contract once its terms submitted
Club cannot see other ORGs Add C until approved
Clubs want to print a contract with only selected Add B clauses showing
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a contract that has some Add B clauses toggled on
custom_steps: WHEN club clicks print
custom_expected: THEN only the Add B clauses that are toggled on are printed

title: Clubs want to print a contract with Addendum C data

custom_expected: THEN the contract will print with Addendum C data populated

custom_steps: WHEN club hits print
custom_expected: THEN the custom language entered appears on all clauses

custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a contract that has some Add B clauses toggled on
custom_steps: WHEN club clicks print
custom_expected: THEN only the Add B clauses that are toggled on are printed

custom_steps: When club clicks print
custom_expected: THEN the contract will print with Addendum C data populated

custom_preconds: GIVEn that club is viewing a contract with custom language entered into each clause
custom_steps: WHEN club hits print
custom_expected: THEN the custom language entered appears on all clauses

title: Clubs want to print a contract with only selected Add B clauses showing
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing a contract that has some Add B clauses toggled on
custom_steps: WHEN club clicks print
custom_expected: THEN only the Add B clauses that are toggled on are printed

title: Clubs want to print a contract with Addendum C data
custom_preconds: Given that club is viewing a contract with Addendum C data
custom_steps: When club clicks print
custom_expected: THEN the contract will print with Addendum C data populated
